```{r}
# Training and testing models with their corresponding data and using SVM

SVM_model <- c("ampir", "ampir_filt","amPEP31", "iAMP-2L","iAMPpred")
Accuracy <- c(0.9116, 0.9483, 0.9653, 0.9691, 0.9071)
TP_rate <- c(0.9197, 0.9518, 0.9801, 1.000, 0.7893)
TN_rate <- c(0.9036, 0.9448, 0.9210, 0.9377, 0.9528)
ROC_AUC <- c(0.9597, 0.9858, 0.9876, 0.9961, 0.9516)
MCC <- c(0.8248, 0.8966, 0.9070, 0.9399, 0.7645)

bm_svm_models <- data.frame(SVM_model, Accuracy, TP_rate, TN_rate, ROC_AUC, MCC, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```


```{r}
# Using 1000 randomly selected proteins from Swiss-Prot (>20 length) to test previously trained SVM models 
SVM_model <- c("ampir", "ampir_filt", "amPEP31", "iAMP-2L","iAMPpred")
Accuracy <- c(0.920, 0.724, 0.688, 0.702, 0.496)
TP_rate <- c(0.9238, 0.4910, 0.7976, 0.9980, 0.0400)
TN_rate <- c(0.9162, 0.9561, 0.5788, 0.4072, 0.9501)
ROC_AUC <- c(0.9636, 0.8615, 0.7382, 0.5822, 0.7327)
MCC <- c(0.84, 0.5052, 0.3857, 0.5018, -0.0236)

bm_svm_models_1000 <- data.frame(SVM_model, Accuracy, TP_rate, TN_rate, ROC_AUC, MCC, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

```
